title: 820-4924 not charging battery
message: Hello, I have this 820-4924 that does not see the AC charger. It can run from battery but when attaching the charge cable no light. When removing the battery I get orange light and working fine. So it only doesnt work when both AC and battery are connected. No obvious liquid damage on the board. Also tried with another good battery same.

title: 820-4924 not charging battery
message: Replaced R7121 & R7122 and working again, so this can be closed.
